title: Karuizawa
description: Karuizawa is a picturesque mountain resort town in Japan, known for its natural beauty and outdoor activities. It's also where my family spent the first year of our time in Japan.

images.title: Karuizawa in Winter
images.description: I'm not sure of the exact date of this photo of downtown Karuizawa. It was taken by my dad in 1975, and clearly it was winter.
